p: The HME caused a significant increment in urine K + and Cl − excretion with lesser Na + and Cl − in serum, without serum K + level alteration as compared to that of F10 mg/kg treated rats. The HME, especially at 200 mg/kg, was able to elicit saliuretic index as closer to F10 mg/kg treated rats. This could be related to the presence of higher K + content in the plant extract and might have advantageous during hypokalemic conditions [ 19].
